subject: Order #SSN1592
description_text:
So I recently order your 
SIMSONN Upgraded PRO Plus Sim Racing Pedals 200KG Load Cell Brake Pedal HE Hydraulic Pedal Black (P3-3 Hydraulic Rods) off Amazon not knowing about your website long with not knowing you make haptics.  But ended up finding out about your haptic for the pedals and ordered them off your website.  At the time I ordered the haptics I didn’t receive the pedal set yet and thought that the pedal control box for the haptics would come w the pedals I recently order.  I didnt get a control box with the haptic control.  So since my order hasn’t shipped yet is there a way to add that to my order?

Thanks

Hyun lee

conversations.body_text: Hi Hyun Lee,  The Upgrade version of the controller sold on Amazon does not support vibration motors. Since you purchased the vibration motor from our official website, you will also need to purchase an additional 24V power supply and a PlusX controller box. We will combine these items into one shipment. The vibration motors will be shipped from China.

I did order the power supply.  Will I have to pay tariff on this?


Thanks

Hyun 

>
I did order the power supply already.   So I will just need to add the controller.  Also am I going to be paying tariffs on this?
你好，Hyun Lee，      您需要购买电源和 PlusX 控制盒。由于我们目前通过免税渠道从中国发货，通常无需缴纳关税。如果您收到需要缴纳关税的通知，请联系我们，我们将为您报销。

On my order I ordered the power supply.  

Thank you

Sent from my iPhone

>
Is there a different power supply than the one I ordered with the 3 haptics?

Hi Hyun Lee,  I just reviewed your order and realized I had made a mistake earlier — your set of three motors already includes a power supply, so there’s no need to purchase an additional one. However, if your pedals are not the latest PlusX version, you will need to purchase a PlusX controller box separately, as the older pedal versions do not support the interface required for connecting the vibration motors.

Okay no problem.  So adding that  to my order do I need to pay shipping again?  If we can combine it w my current order that would be great.
Sent from my iPhone

>

Please let me know so I can process my order.

Thank you

Hyun
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Hyun Lee,  Please place the order using this link, and make sure to write “PlusX Main Controller” in the order notes!      https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

Thank you
Sent from my iPhone

>
One last thing, when do you plan to ship out this order?  Thank you
你好，Hyun Lee，  由于 VAM Pro 外壳表面处理延迟，首批订单预计将于 6 月 16 日至 18 日开始发货。我们将使用国际快递，确保快速送达。

Just would like to know if my order has been shipped yet?

Thank you
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Hyun Lee,    Yes, your order was shipped yesterday, but due to the cumbersome customs clearance now, they may take around the 28th to arrive .

Hello, so it seems like the tracking number doesn't seem to be working.
What is the normal transit time I should expect for arrival?

Thank you

On Fri, Jun 20, 2025 at 5:35 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Hyun Lee,     You can use this link to track it, it has now gone through customs and is expected to arrive for you around the 5th.  https://www.track718.us/zh-CN/detail?nums=JSEXK1912153584YQ

Thank you very much for the update.  I installed everything, but in the
simpson manager software it says that the device is disconnected and has a
red dot.  I also can not configure the pedals anymore.  I have the latest
update.  I have plugged in the usb in different ports to see if that works,
but got nothing.

Whatever help you can provide would be greatly appreciated

Thanks

On Fri, Jul 4, 2025 at 10:52 AM service@simsonn.com

So I added the ground wire and it does connect but there is a delay on response. Also the DC input sparks every time I plug it in and my game assetto corsa doesn’t respond to the Simsonn pedals even though it shows the pedal choice as the pedals I’m using but it won’t respond when I enter in the inputs of the pedal.

Hello so I feel like the plus x controller might have some flaws and grounding it didn’t seem to help. I keep getting a lag on response and the system seems to go on and off. Will the pro x ultra control work better?

Hi Hyun Lee,       If the connection is intermittent, we’ve tested extensively with other customers and haven’t encountered this issue. Please avoid using a USB hub—make sure to plug the device directly into a USB 3.0 port on your computer. Unstable power supply is usually the main cause of disconnection problems.  Additionally, if you notice input lag or data delays, please disable "Level of Filtering", then click Save to apply the changes. You can also use the VKB tool to test the response curve.     The spark is not an issue—many Apple chargers behave similarly. It occurs when the capacitor in the motor is being charged. It won’t damage the mainboard and poses no safety risk, as the voltage is only 24V.

Hello, and thank you for the information.  It has done the trick and is
working now.

Thank you again

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025 at 1:30 AM service@simsonn.com
